Question.Subject: How Can I send a direct message on twitter?
Question.Content: Can you do that if I am following them but they haven't sent me a message?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
You can only send direct message to person who follows you.
You can send a direct message simply by adding the character “d” before the user name.
Example; direct message to Alex d Alex Saints win the Superbowl!
Only the person you are directing this message to will see it.
